headline: There Were 2 Mass Shootings In Texas Last Week, But Only 1 On TV
short_description: She left her husband. He killed their children. Just another day in America.

headline: Will Smith Joins Diplo And Nicky Jam For The 2018 World Cup's Official Song
short_description: Of course it has a song.

headline: Hugh Grant Marries For The First Time At Age 57
short_description: The actor and his longtime girlfriend Anna Eberstein tied the knot in a civil ceremony.

headline: Jim Carrey Blasts 'Castrato' Adam Schiff And Democrats In New Artwork
short_description: The actor gives Dems an ass-kicking for not fighting hard enough against Donald Trump.

headline: Julianna Margulies Uses Donald Trump Poop Bags To Pick Up After Her Dog
short_description: The "Dietland" actress said using the bags is a "really cathartic, therapeutic moment."
